product_name: Ortlieb Velocity Black N' White Cycling Backpack
long_description: The Ortlieb Velocity Black 'N White Cycling Backpack delivers reliable protection from the elements. Its waterproof fabric and roll-top closure make it great for commuting and recreational rides. Roll closure with rip-and-stick tabs offers fast access and easy loading. Padded back with air channels offers excellent ventilation. Removable inner pocket holds keys, change or mobile phone; pocket can also be used as hipbelt pocket. Protection around the base corners helps prevent abrasion. Hipbelt secures the Ortlieb Velocity Black 'N White Cycling Backpack safely to your back. Carrying handle; sternum strap; reflective yarn on shoulder straps.
short_description: The Ortlieb Velocity Black 'N White Cycling Backpack delivers reliable protection from the elements. Its waterproof fabric and roll-top closure make it great for commuting and recreational rides.
